name: Privy, Inc.
description: Provider of a web marketing platform intended to help businesses to build more customer relationships in a faster way. The company's platform generates data about audiences, analyzes how the promotions are being utilized and organizes the customer lists for additional follow-through, enabling clients to grow in terms of revenue.
one_liner: Provider of a web marketing platform intended to help businesses to build more customer relationships in a faster way. The company's platform generates data about audiences, analyzes how the promotions are being utilized and organizes the customer lists for additional follow-through, enabling clients to grow in terms of revenue.
